attributes.action: Travel Subsidy for Carers and Sick People
attributes.additional_details:
I petition the Government to allow Carers and Sick People to be able to claim a travel subsidy from the Government.

It is known that people who have disabilities and terminally ill patients having problems such as Leukemia and Cancer generally require trips to Hospital.

People who live on benefts have the added problem of having to use what little money they have to get transportation to Hospital and are forced between eat or health.

I therefore petition the Government to allow people with specific medical problems to be allowed to claim a travel subsidy.
